mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.rule_code AS "ruleCode", a.rule_name AS "ruleName", a.rotation_type AS "rotationType", a.lot_code AS "lotCode", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId"
mapper.select:
SELECT , c.lot_name As lotName FROM cd_rule_rotation_header a LEFT JOIN cd_wh_lot_header c ON a.lot_code = c.lot_code AND a.org_id = c.org_id
WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cd_rule_rotation_header( id, rule_code, rule_name, rotation_type, lot_code, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ruleCode}, #{ruleName}, #{rotationType}, #{lotCode}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cd_rule_rotation_header SET rule_code = #{ruleCode}, rule_name = #{ruleName}, rotation_type = #{rotationType}, lot_code = #{lotCode}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, org_id = #{orgId} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cd_rule_rotation_header WHERE rule_code = #{ruleCode} AND org_id = #{orgId}
